title: Terrible MS lag.
body:
Hi everyone, 
For some odd reason about a month ago my computer playing ONLY LEAGUE has me MS lagging really really hard. I dont lag with any other game and I have good internet, and just recently bought a 2k laptop. 
I dont know what the problem is, it didnt start happening until about a month ago, ive tried turning my settings down and Ive resulted to disconnecting my second monitor. 
Anyone know of a fix, or have the same problem? 

Its just weird. Thanks for your help.

replies.body:
Big changes in latency (ms) are usually caused by routing decisions by your ISP or their partners that directly affected the length of time it takes for your connection to hit our servers. Before we take a look at your route, I'd like you to first work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this issue isn't caused by a bad network configuration on your local end.

Let me know if this helped.
